job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Selby Jennings is working with a high level banking institution to find the best technology talent to build their FinTech team. They have multiple teams hiring for various roles with full-time opportunities. Read below for the responsibilities and qualifications of the role to see if it’s a good fit for you. 


Responsibilities:

  • Own your system as you write new code/APIs and have a large impact on different products
  • Entrepreneurial approach to problem solving and solution development
  • Assist in defining the technical architecture of mission critical systems
  • Find and implement new technology and research to further develop the systems you’ve created


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or relevant field
  • At least 1-6 years of experience as a professional software engineer
  • Mastery of Java technologies
  • Strong understanding of modern software architecture
  • Experience with full-stack JS, React, Node.js, and others


Others to be considered:

  • AWS experience
  • Big data technology experience (kafka or hadoop)
  • Previous financial experience


Made it this far? Take the time to apply and submit your resume!
